name: Dead Zombie Targeted Shooter
description: Dead Zombie Targeted Shooter is the most realistic action game. Become a killer, you feel as a real commando, you have to kill all the zombies in your area and clear the houses to kill dangerous zombies. Shooting Zombie Shooting game is full action packed. Assassinate the zombie with your favourite weapon because you are a soldier from the army force. This game is here for your great excitement time. Use your sniper skills to shoot every target you can in this shooting simulator. Killing zombie is not board game, everybody likes shooting action game. This is the best chance for better shooter to test your sniper shooting skills.
